headline.main: BRITISH VIEW MOSCOW AS SAFE FOR WINTER; One Scarce Pats Odds at 20-1 -- Nazi Caucasus Drive Seen

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 23 (AP) -- Predictions that Moscow would hold out through the long Russian Winter and that the main force of the German drive would be switched southeast toward the Caucasus came tonight from informed British sources.
abstract: London sources expect Moscow to hold out through Winter
snippet: LONDON, Oct. 23 (AP) -- Predictions that Moscow would hold out through the long Russian Winter and that the main force of the German drive would be switched southeast toward the Caucasus came tonight from informed British sources....
